short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to generate contact messages to Spareroom adverts using AI, and based on your preferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leverage the power of ChatGPT and Artificial Intelligence to easily generate contact messages for Spareroom adverts.

With this extension, you will be able to generate messages instantly and greatly improve the amount of flats you contact. All you have to do is give a few basic information about yourself (to help clarify the whether you would be an ideal flatmate or not) and the extension will create a unique message as if you wrote it. 

How do I use this extension?
1. Fill in the data you want to be used in the 'Profile Information' section
2. Navigate to https://www.spareroom.co.uk and click on any advert that you are interested in
3. Once on the advert page, click the 'Generate Message' button
4. Done! Your custom AI generated message is saved to your clipboard

By default, it will ask about availability of viewings.

Give it a go and provide feedback to suggest improvements :)

Latest update: added support for US marketplace, added rating link.
